Text.Page:
I managed to get here in one piece, but returning to Elenea won't be so easy with those wandering hellhounds around.

I've been watching them, though, and I've noticed they don't go near one particular type of bad-smelling flower.

It seems to repel them. Could you find me some of those flowers so that I can keep those hounds away from me?

They do smell really horrible, don't they?

This should be enough to get me safely back to Elenea. Many thanks!

This won't guarantee me a safe return to Elenea.

Please find me some more.
